TCName.name: IBTCreationfromStoretoStore
TCName.SOH: select store_soh, store_soh_rand_wght from saap.local_wow_soh where article='art_no'
TCName.OM: select article_om from saap.zwowc_article_listing where matnr='art_no'
TCName.SOHCALCULATION: select store_soh, STORE_SOH_RAND_WGHT from saap.local_wow_soh where article='art_no'
TCName.Store: select KDGRP from saap.zwowc_cust_master where kunnr = 'store_no'
TCName.BaseUOM: select MEINS from ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM where matnr = 'art_no' and base_uom_ind = 'Y'
TCName.DraftOrder: select supplier,create_user,status,order_type, pickup_date,auth_date,chilled_temperature,frozen_temperature,order_no from LOCAL_WOW_DRAFT_IBT_ORDER where supplier = 'site_no'
TCName.DraftOrder_error: select supplier,create_user,status,order_type, pickup_date from LOCAL_WOW_DRAFT_IBT_ORDER where supplier = 'site_no'

TCName.name: IBTCancellation
TCName.articles: select a.matnr from saap.zwowc_article_listing a, saap.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_master b WHERE a.matnr = b.matnr and b.online_desc like '%Chocolate%' and a.lifnr = '3908'
